attributes.action: Please when ou consider the tax cuts to  regenerate the economy dont forget Disabled People who are unable to work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In recent years Disabled people have been the forgotton minority.  When you bring in the measures to regenerate the economy, please dont forget the hardest hit and least able to find alternative sources, Disabled people and Benefit Levels.

Consider

Heating Allowance for at least those on Highest rate care componant of DLA

An Allowance that covers the tax that those on Highest rate mobility componant have to pay on Petrol if they have a car.

The Level of Benefits for the Disabled People who definitly cant work and the average earnings of the average UK employee.

Creating a way that Disabled People who are only able to live off of benefits might be able to become owner occupiers rather than making up of over 50% of all Social Landlord Tenants.

There are many more, but please I and Im sure many others do as well.  DONT MAKE US THE FORGOTTEN MINORITY YET AGAIN.
